author: CBC News
title: 1 in 3 Canadians worry they'll miss rent or mortgage payment due to COVID-19 — survey
description: In addition to its serious health consequences, COVID-19 is causing Canadians to worry about their financial health, according to a survey commissioned by the Angus Reid Institute.
content:
In addition to its serious health consequences, COVID-19 is causing Canadians to worry about their financial health, according to a survey commissioned by the Angus Reid Institute.
